data.name: Volcarona

attacks.name: Solar Transporter
attacks.text: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck and put all Team Plasma cards you find there into your hand. Discard the other cards.

attacks.name: Leech Life
attacks.text: Heal from this Pokémon the same amount of damage you did to the Defending Pokémon.

data.flavorText: Thought to be an embodiment of the sun, it appeared during a bitterly cold winter and saved Pokémon from freezing.

data.name: Volcarona

attacks.name: Shimmering Scales
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused. If tails, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Power Hurricane
attacks.text: Discard all Energy attached to this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: When volcanic ash darkened the atmosphere, it is said that Volcarona's fire provided a replacement for the sun.

data.name: Volcarona

attacks.name: Solar Birth
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Then, search your deck for up to 2 basic Energy cards and attach them to that Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: When volcanic ash darkened the atmosphere, it is said that Volcarona's fire provided a replacement for the sun.

data.name: Volcarona

ancientTrait.name: θ Stop
ancientTrait.text: Prevent all effects of your opponent's Pokémon's Abilities done to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Burning Scales
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Wind Wheel
attacks.text: Your opponent switches his or her Active Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

data.flavorText: When volcanic ash darkened the atmosphere, it is said that Volcarona's fire provided a replacement for the sun.

data.name: Volcarona

abilities.name: Heat Cyclone
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may have your opponent switch their Active Pokémon with 1 of their Benched Pokémon.

data.flavorText: A sea of fire engulfs the surroundings of their battles, since they use their six wings to scatter their ember scales.

data.name: Volcarona

attacks.name: Fiery Dance
attacks.text: Attach a basic Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Heat Wave
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

data.flavorText: When volcanic ash darkened the atmosphere, it is said that Volcarona's fire provided a replacement for the sun.

data.name: Volcarona

abilities.name: Scorching Scales
abilities.text: Put 4 damage counters instead of 2 on your opponent's Burned Pokémon between turns.

attacks.name: Burning Wind
attacks.text: You may discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon. If you do, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

data.flavorText: A sea of fire engulfs the surroundings of their battles, since they use their six wings to scatter their ember scales.

data.name: Volcarona-GX
rules: Pokémon-GX rule: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Flaming Shot
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a Fire Energy card from your hand. If you do, put 2 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Backfire
attacks.text: Put 2 Fire Energy attached to this Pokémon into your hand.

attacks.name: Massive Heat Wave-GX
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from each of your opponent's Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

data.name: Volcarona

attacks.name: Cauterize
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon has no damage counters on it before this attack does damage, this attack does nothing.

data.flavorText: According to legends, it was hatched from a flaming cocoon to save people and Pokémon that were suffering from the cold.

data.name: Volcarona

abilities.name: Scorching Scales
abilities.text: Put 4 damage counters instead of 2 on your opponent's Burned Pokémon between turns.

attacks.name: Burning Wind
attacks.text: You may discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon. If you do, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

data.flavorText: A sea of fire engulfs the surroundings of their battles, since they use their six wings to scatter their ember scales.

data.name: Volcarona

attacks.name: Fire Spin
attacks.text: Discard 2 Energy from this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: According to legends, it was hatched from a flaming cocoon to save people and Pokémon that were suffering from the cold.

data.name: Volcarona V
rules: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Surging Flames
attacks.text: This attack does 20 more damage for each basic Energy card in your discard pile. Then, shuffle those Energy cards into your deck.

attacks.name: Fire Blast
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.

data.name: Volcarona V
rules: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Surging Flames
attacks.text: This attack does 20 more damage for each basic Energy card in your discard pile. Then, shuffle those Energy cards into your deck.

attacks.name: Fire Blast
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.

data.name: Volcarona

attacks.name: Volcanic Heat
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

data.flavorText: Volcarona scatters burning scales. Some say it does this to start fires. Others say it's trying to rescue those that suffer in the cold.

data.name: Volcarona

attacks.name: Flame Cloak
attacks.text: Attach a Basic Fire Energy card from your discard pile to this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: Its burning body causes it to be unpopular in hot parts of the world, but in cold ones, Volcarona is revered as an embodiment of the sun.

attacks.name: Leech Life
attacks.text: Heal from this Pokémon the same amount of damage you did to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Turbulent Wings
attacks.text: This Pokémon also does 50 damage to itself.

data.name: Volcarona
data.flavorText: This Pokémon scatters burning scales. Most of the danger of these scales is not in their heat—it's in the way they rob the surrounding air of oxygen.

data.name: Volcarona

abilities.name: Torrid Scales
abilities.text: You must discard a Basic Fire Energy card from your hand in order to use this Ability. Once during your turn, you may make your opponent's Active Pokémon Burned.

data.flavorText: When volcanic ash darkened the atmosphere, it is said that Volcarona's fire provided a replacement for the sun.
